<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75277</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>237f7bc4-7e6d-4727-93e0-b2b727322f5b#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Szilárd anyagok hőtágulása</string>
            <string language="en">heat expansion of steady materials</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitzeexpansion der unveränderlichen Materialien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expansion de la chaleur des matériaux réguliers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expansão do calor de materiais constantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espansione di calore dei materiali costanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επέκταση θερμότητας των σταθερών υλικών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">extensión del calor de materiales constantes</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Hőtágulása fogalma, mértéke, gyakorlati alkalmazások</string>
            <string language="en">Notion of heat expansion, it's measure, practical using</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">hőjelenségek,  hőtáguás,  hőtágulási együttható,  bimetál,  </string>
            <string language="en">heat phenomenas,  heat expansion,  heat expansion co-efficient,  bimetal,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Begriff der Hitzeexpansion, ist es Maß, 
praktisches Verwenden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notion d'expansion de la chaleur, c'est mesure, 
utilisation pratique</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Noção da expansão do calor, é medida, usar-se 
prático</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nozione di espansione di calore, è misura, 
usando pratico</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η έννοια της επέκτασης θερμότητας, αυτό είναι μέτρο,
πρακτική χρησιμοποίηση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Noción de la extensión del calor, es medida, el
usar práctico</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erhitzen Sie phenomenas, Hitzeexpansion, Hitzeexpansion 
Koeffizient, Bimetall,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chauffez les phenomenas, expansion de la chaleur, 
coefficient d'expansion de la chaleur, bimétal,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aqueça phenomenas, expansão do calor, coeficiente da 
expansão do calor, bimetal,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riscaldi i phenomenas, l'espansione di calore, il 
coefficente di espansione di calore, bimetallo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">phenomenas θερμότητας, επέκταση θερμότητας, συντελεστής 
επέκτασης θερμότητας, bimetal,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">caliente los phenomenas, extensión del calor, 
coeficiente de la extensión del calor, bimetal,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

          <taxonPath>

        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
